subject: SAME-RECORD VALUE COMPARISON - Additional Finding
body:
Team,

I compared SAME records by ID to verify VALUES match:

## VALUE COMPARISON (Same Record)
| Endpoint | Record ID | Values |
|----------|-----------|--------|
| Categories | 66c4d370a87a956db06c49eb | IDENTICAL |
| Roles | 66cb85ac74dca51e34e268ed | IDENTICAL |
| Organizers | 6806691a2f926881302124dd | IDENTICAL |
| Venues | 680c5113ef6308b31e5b5686 | archivedAt DIFFERS! |
| Events | 68532f5fa1e3cfb6f8bb9cd2 | IDENTICAL (common attrs) |

## VENUE archivedAt DIFFERENCE
Same record ID, different timestamps:
- Express: 2025-12-06T16:25:52.677Z
- AF TEST: 2025-12-05T23:33:21.527Z

This suggests AF and Express are pointing to DIFFERENT databases OR there is a caching issue.

Gotan - Can you confirm both point to same MongoDB?

## UPDATED GOALS
1. Fulton: Fix count discrepancies (Organizers -2, Venues +2, Events +10)
2. Fulton: Add 18 missing Event attributes
3. Ben: Confirm computed vs stored attributes
4. ALL: Verify same database connection

- Sarah
